label: Landeria, José M. & Hiroaki Tamura.  2018. Morphology of the first zoea of Chaceon affinis (A. Milne-Edwards & Bouvier, 1894) and occurrence of Chaceon spp. larvae (Decapoda: Brachyura:  Gerynonidae) in the Canary Islands waters, Northeastern Atlantic. Zootaxa 4413(3): 579–585.
